title: 105_hr3562
content: Employee Participation Incentive Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish a maximum tax rate of 30 percent for certain corporations with both an employee voting and value percentage of at least 20 percent. (2) provide an exclusion, of up to 20 percent of wages, from gross income for compensation paid in stock by certain corporations. And (3) permit a deduction to certain corporations when granting qualified stock options.
